A Mint stamp or an Artist-signed Mint stamp must be
purchased with each Regular Edition, Conservation Edition, or Medallion Edition
print. Both a Mint stamp and an artist-signed Mint stamp must be purchased with
each Executive Edition print. (b) License issuing officers other than
employees of the department may sell migratory bird stamps for a fee of $5 plus
50 cents to be retained by the issuing agent or officer. License issuing
officers who are employees of the department may sell migratory bird stamps for
$5.50, but may not retain the 50 cent fee. (c) First or original sales of migratory bird
products will be made by the department through the Division of Fish, Wildlife, and Marine Resources at 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12233. The department may
also, by contract, authorize its contractor to make first or original sales of
such products. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
185.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
